alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Franklin; Henry; Jefferson; Oldham; Shelby (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 9:22PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Oldham, Shelby, northwestern Woodford, northeastern Anderson, southwestern Henry, east central Jefferson and Franklin Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 921 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Coldstream to near Frankfort, over interstate 64. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Frankfort around 940 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include La Grange. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Franklin; Henry; Jefferson; Oldham; Shelby
